Control Name: REL 2.1 Use highly available network connectivity for your workload public endpoints
Control Statement: These endpoints and the routing to them must be highly available. To achieve this, use highly available DNS, content delivery networks (CDNs), API Gateway, load balancing, or reverse proxies.

control_attributes.Control: REL 2.1 Use highly available network connectivity for your workload public endpoints
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you plan your network topology?
